main event: On October 6, 1967, a witness observed a bright, white light in the sky near Milledgeville, Georgia that appeared to be hovering and then rapidly accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The object left a trail of white vapor behind it as it accelerated.
The witness stated the object was unlike any aircraft they had seen before.
Several base personnel at Milledgeville Air Force Base also witnessed a large, glowing disc-shaped object hovering over a rural area near the base.
The disc-shaped object was estimated to be 75-100 feet in diameter and emitted a bright, pulsating light.
After hovering for several minutes, the object shot straight up at a high rate of speed and disappeared from sight.
sighted object: a bright, white light; a large, glowing disc-shaped object
witnesses: a civilian witness, Milledgeville Air Force Base personnel
photographs: yes, the report includes photographs of the unidentified objects
